note:
Yet another cishet white male, interested in talking to anyone about anything. Here to learn, so tell me if I screw up or if unconscious bias surfaces.

Husband, father of 2 boys, reader of books, player of games, watcher of birds, guardian of foxes, headbanger of metal, builder of Lego.

NHS doctor specialising in Microbiology and Infectious Diseases. Free at the point of use.

Now with 87% more glitter.
